Whatever the case, it unfortunately set the tone of the career of Alisha Itkin, who would have lots of dance chart success, but would never have a pop single rise higher than Number 54.

 

Of course, the teen music scene that exploded in the late 1990s didnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t exist in the early 1980s.
